content: "Step out of the car sir. Are you aware you were driving well over the seed limit? Also your car is full of oranges." SEE ALSO: Knives were taken off the streets in London and melted down to build a free outdoor gym Police in Seville, Spain, apprehended five suspects on Friday for allegedly stealing 4,000 kilos of oranges. Police stopped the vehicles when they noticed three cars driving very close together, according to local media . #PolicíaSevilla denuncia a cinco personas por el presunto robo de 4.000 kilos de naranjas en una nave de #Carmona #Sevilla + Info /TNHQAQswAV pic.twitter.com/429OAVOHBc — Emergencias Sevilla (@EmergenciasSev) January 26, 2018 Image: @emergenciassev Image: @EmergenciasSev Image: @EmergenciasSev Image: @EmergenciasSev The five people arrested claimed they had picked the fruits themselves, but police learned a ship docked in the nearby town of Carmona had reported the stolen fruit hours before the arrests took place.

Police arrest 5 people after finding 4,000 kilos of oranges in their cars

Share
Tweet
What's This?
By Isobel Hamilton2018-01-31 14:53:09 UTC

"Step out of the car sir. Are you aware you were driving well over the seed limit? Also your car is full of oranges."

SEE ALSO: Knives were taken off the streets in London and melted down to build a free outdoor gym

Police in Seville, Spain, apprehended five suspects on Friday for allegedly stealing 4,000 kilos of oranges.

Police stopped the vehicles when they noticed three cars driving very close together, according to local media.

#PolicíaSevilla denuncia a cinco personas por el presunto robo de 4.000 kilos de naranjas en una nave de #Carmona #Sevilla
+ Info https://t.co/TNHQAQswAV pic.twitter.com/429OAVOHBc

— Emergencias Sevilla (@EmergenciasSev) January 26, 2018

The five people arrested claimed they had picked the fruits themselves, but police learned a ship docked in the nearby town of Carmona had reported the stolen fruit hours before the arrests took place.

WATCH: 'Game of Thrones' star Lena Headey on how cast reacted to final script

Topics: Culture, oranges, other, police, seville
